movie.title: It Happened in Rome
movie.description_intro: Three girls are on a hitchhiking trip through northern Italy, the riviera, Venice, Pisa and Rome.
movie.description_full: Three girls are on a hitchhiking trip through northern Italy, the riviera, Venice, Pisa and Rome.

movies.title: The Parole Officer
movies.summary: Failed parole officer Simon Garden (Coogan) is framed for a murder committed by one of Manchester's leading police officers. The only evidence proving his innocence is a CCTV video tape locked inside a bank vault. With the help of four inept ex-criminals and token love interest Emma (Lena Headey), Garden must break into the bank and steal the CCTV footage in order to clear his name.
movies.description_full: Failed parole officer Simon Garden (Coogan) is framed for a murder committed by one of Manchester's leading police officers. movies.title: The Moderns
movies.summary: Nick Hart is a struggling American artist who lives amongst the expatriate community in 1920s Paris. He spends most of his time drinking and socializing in local cafés and pestering gallery owner Libby Valentin to sell his paintings. He becomes involved in a plot by wealthy art patroness Nathalie de Ville to forge three paintings. This leads to several run-ins with American rubber magnate Bertram Stone, who happens to be married to Hart's ex-wife Rachel.

movies.title: The Farmer's Wife
movies.summary: Farmer Sweetland is a lonely old widower. He is determined to marry again and he enlists the help of his housekeeper Minta to pick a wife from the local single women.
movies.description_full: Farmer Sweetland is a lonely old widower. He is determined to marry again and he enlists the help of his housekeeper Minta to pick a wife from the local single women.

movies.title: The Jerky Boys
movies.summary: When two unemployed telephone pranksters decide to use their vocal "talents" to impersonate a Chicago mob boss and curry favor with organized crime in New York, the trouble begins. It isn't long before Johnny and Kamal (the "Jerky Boys" of crank call fame) are wanted by the local mafia, the police, and their neighbor.
